solve and make.principles: Augue interdum velit euismod in pellentesque massa placerat duis ultricies lacus sed turpis tincidunt id aliquet risus feugiat in ante metus dictum at tempor commodo ullamcorper a lacus
solve and make.automation: Reproducibility occurs when there is a foundation of quality experimental data in the underlying data set. To achieve quality data, standard operating procedures are implemented to create standardization within processes.  We carefully select simple, repetitive, in-house experimental procedures to automate. This automation benefits data quality  as it relieves the team from repetitive work, to focus on more complex tasks – like data evaluation.
solve and make.parallel: When processes are grouped and executed – the basis of Henry Ford’s assembly line production system – synergies occur. To benefit from synergies and to foster standardization Evologic is running numerous, fully equipped bioreactors in parallel. That’s why we keep our team outnumbered by bioreactors.
solve and make.scalability: We start by thinking big. If it cannot be thought of on  a large scale, we’d rather start the thinking process over. The economy of scale effect is pre-dominantly associated with increasing production volume by increasing the manufacturing volume per vessel. Picture the effort it takes to run 1000x 1L shake flasks versus the effort of running 1x 1000L bioreactor.
solve and make.cells: For optimization purposes we focus on the cells. By understanding and addressing the needs of the cells, productivity is attainable through technological means. This requires substantial analytical effort, but also allows us to tailor the physiological state of the cells at the time-point of harvest. Instead of simply producing biomass we can target healthy or stressed cells – whatever fits the purpose.
solve and make.target: Targets cannot be hit if they aren’t defined. Let us start  by defining the most critical criteria of your organism in terms of its quality. This includes identifying the difference that makes your product work in the field. This quality criterion will then be set as your organization’s acceptance criteria for batch approval. Also, pricing is relevant to define what degrees of freedom exist for implementation.
solve and make.implementation: To reproducibly obtain the desired product quality, we need to complete the manufacturing process within the biological and technical design space. We will go the extra mile to ensure your product lives up to your expectations.
solve and make.encapsulation: Are you in need of encapsulation expertise? Evologic is one of the leading companies in biological encapsulation. Using bio-polymers, we are able to formulate a product of interest according to a specified and desired particle size. And if you prefer a dry product – we have a track record of drying even the encapsulated product. Let's discuss how to obtain your goals using tools outside the standard tool box.
solve and make.quality: Quality is defined in manufacturing and preserved in formulation. Consequently, we carefully monitor product quality characteristics through each unit operation to ensure you are satisfied upon delivery.
